name: zygarde-cube
effect: Contains collected Zygarde cells/cores. Can teach Zygarde moves.
short_effect: Contains collected Zygarde cells/cores. Can teach Zygarde moves.

flavor_text.sun-moon: An item to store Zygarde Cores and Cells. You can also use it to teach Zygarde moves.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: An item to store Zygarde Cores and Cells. You can also use it to teach Zygarde moves.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: An item to store Zygarde Cores and Cells. You can also use it to teach Zygarde moves.
